item.title: Seconds going too fast!
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

hi,
still making a script with repeating itself stuff
the only problem now is: MY SECONDS ARE GOING TOO FAST!
this is the script, plz be nice and test it, and maybe tell how i can make it so the seconds are going like… seconds, thanks

[code]public class Loops
{
static int mSeconds = 0;
static int Seconds = 0;
static int Minutes = 0;
static int Hours = 0;

public static void main(String[] args)
{
Process();
}

public static void Process()
{
while (mSeconds <= 999)
{
mSeconds++;
System.out.println(“Time running: “+Hours+”:”+Minutes+":"+Seconds+":"+mSeconds);
}
Seconds++;
mSeconds = 0;
Process2();
}

public static void Process2()
{
if(Seconds==60)
{
Minutes++;
Seconds=0;
}
if(Minutes==60)
{
Hours++;
Minutes=0;
}
Process();
}
}

[/code]

Read full topic
